definition: to defend the crown (in sports championship)
surname Wei/vassal state during the Zhou Dynasty (1066-221 BC), located in present day Henan and Hebei Provinces
to guard/to protect/to defend/abbr. for 衛生|卫生, hygiene/health/abbr. for 衛生間|卫生间, toilet
crown in the form of a horizontal board with hanging decorations/imperial crown

sentences.english: That may not be enough for Team New Zealand to successfully defend the Cup.
sentences.chinese: 這也許不足以使新西蘭隊成功衛冕。

sentences.english: So he signed a one-year deal with the defending champion Lakers.
sentences.chinese: 因此，他和衛冕冠軍湖人隊簽了一年合同。

sentences.english: The defending champion did not struggle on any of his service games in the second set.
sentences.chinese: 衛冕冠軍第二盤的發球局保得很輕鬆。

sentences.english: The champion was dethroned by a young boxer.
sentences.chinese: 年輕的拳師打敗了衛冕冠軍。

sentences.english: He downed the champion with a left hook.
sentences.chinese: 他以一個左鉤拳擊倒了衛冕冠軍。

sentences.english: The team knew that they were capable of ousting the cup holders from the competition.
sentences.chinese: 這支球隊知道他們能夠在比賽中擊敗獎盃衛冕者。

sentences.english: However had Looney's eruption, the defending champion gas has calmed oneself down idly .
sentences.chinese: 不過有了魯尼的爆發，衛冕冠軍氣定神閒。

sentences.english: He is also the title defender for this year's Tennis Masters Cup.
sentences.chinese: 同時，他也是今年網球大師杯賽的衛冕者。

sentences.english: Had United retained the Champions League, he'd surely have added the Ballon d'Or.
sentences.chinese: 而曼聯也衛冕冠軍，他本應再來個金球獎的。

sentences.english: Thedefending champion Arbi succeeded in retaining the trophy.
sentences.chinese: 上屆冠軍阿爾比衛冕成功。

sentences.english: Now with just six games to go in the race for the title, United are getter closer and closer to retaining the crown.
sentences.chinese: 現在聯賽只剩六場比賽了，紅魔離衛冕越來越近了。

sentences.english: You're guaranteeing that this horse is gonna win the Triple Crown.
sentences.chinese: 你能夠擔保這匹馬能衛冕三連冠嗎？

sentences.english: In the end, Liuxiang succeeded in winning the first place at the 100-metre hurdle race.
sentences.chinese: 最終，劉翔在百米跨欄賽跑中成功衛冕冠軍。

sentences.english: Vitali will show a great performance and defend his title.
sentences.chinese: 維塔利將顯示一個偉大業績和衛冕冠軍。

sentences.english: And that's why the German record champions are not going to underestimate Eintracht.
sentences.chinese: 那就是爲什麼德甲衛冕冠軍並沒有低估對手。

definition: to win by a narrow margin/to barely win/narrow victory
to defeat decisively/to win decisively/great victory/triumph
to seize the crown/fig. to win a championship/to win gold medal
(sports) to go out of bounds/to go over the line/to qualify for the next round of competition/(Tw) (fig.) to make the grade/to achieve success
